title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
summary: Sherlock Holmes investigates a murder linked to a legendary hound on the moors.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
summary: Elizabeth Bennet navigates society, family, and her evolving feelings for Mr. Darcy.

author: George Orwell
summary: Winston Smith grapples with surveillance, truth, and resistance in a totalitarian state.
